backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining authorization, storage mixins, and extensive type models for hero themes, visual effects, clinics, services, and social media.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module containing old type definitions to support data transformation from the previous schema to the updated backend types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, descriptions, related files, components, and test coverage for hero theme particle effect enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of many frontend files describing their roles in the UI, data fetching, admin tools, and visual components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the frontend React application.
frontend/src/.well-known/ic-domains: Domain configuration file specifying the IC domain used by the frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, admin panel toggling, profile setup, theming, and rendering all main site sections.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Renders the About section, handling loading, error, admin editing, doctor image, text content, and credentials.
frontend/src/components/admin/ClinicsMan: Admin UI for adding, editing, and deleting clinics, including image upload with progress tracking and form dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContentMan: Admin tool for managing website images and hero section text, supporting uploads, editing, and predefined image configs.
frontend/src/components/admin/HeroThemeM: Admin interface for editing hero section theme settings with live state updates, validation, and save functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/ServicesMa: UI for listing, adding, editing, and deleting services using dialog forms and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/SocialMedi: Admin interface to manage social media links with validation, ordering, visibility, and CRUD operations.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Displays the admin panel UI with tabs for managing content, clinics, services, social media, and hero theme.
frontend/src/components/Clinics.tsx: Fetches and displays clinic locations with loading/error states and admin visibility handling.
frontend/src/components/DoctorCredential: Shows doctor credentials with editable fields and image when admin, using a dialog for updates.
Allows admins to edit website text fields with inline editing and save/cancel controls.
frontend/src/components/EditableFooterCo: Provides inline editing for footer fields like address, phone, email, and copyright for admins.
frontend/src/components/EditableHeroCont: Enables editing of hero section text and buttons, using a dialog for admin modifications.
frontend/src/components/EditableImage.ts: Component that displays an image and allows admins to upload or update standard and dark‑mode versions with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Fetches and displays footer content, social links, and contact info with admin editing support and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, theme toggle, Internet Identity login/logout, and optional admin panel toggle.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section rendering dynamic content, background images, layout presets, admin editing, and theme-aware visual effects.
frontend/src/components/hero/effects/Mot: Canvas-based motion effect renderer supporting wave and floating gradient animations tied to config values.
frontend/src/components/hero/effects/Par: Canvas renderer generating particle animations such as bubbles, sparkles, dots, confetti, and rings based on effect settings.
frontend/src/components/hero/effects/Vec: SVG-based animated vector patterns or paths driven by complexity, color scheme, and effect type.
frontend/src/components/hero/FloatingMed: Empty placeholder file for a hero-layer component.
frontend/src/components/hero/HeroMultiEf: Combines particle, motion, and vector effect layers and renders them conditionally based on config and enabled state.
frontend/src/components/hero/HeroSpecial: Empty placeholder file for special effects layer in the hero section.
frontend/src/components/Overview.tsx: Overview section showing highlight cards and editable overview text, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting users to enter and save their name to complete profile setup.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Displays a services section with loading and error states, fetching services and admin status before rendering cards or hiding the section.
frontend/src/components/SocialMedia.tsx: Fetches social media links and admin status, showing icons for visible links with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeroLayoutPreset.t: Analyzes a hero image to compute an optimal layout preset with overlay, sizing, and positioning adjustments.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login state, identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin status, website content, and related backend data using an actor and identity.
frontend/src/ic-assets.json: Specifies asset rules for the build, including handling of the .well-known directory.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including an extensive color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/heroImageAnalysis.ts: Implements client‑side image analysis to compute brightness, contrast, weight distribution, and busyness for hero images.
frontend/src/utils/heroThemeDefaults.ts: Provides utilities for validating, normalizing, and safely converting hero theme configuration values, including bigint helpers.
frontend/src/utils/particleEffectTypes.t: Defines metadata for particle effect types and helpers for retrieving human‑readable labels and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from either session or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, shadows, radii, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including existing features, new feature requests, metadata, and version info.
